auction.dataaccess

Class AuctionDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • auction.dataaccess.AuctionDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DAO<Auction,java.lang.Integer>

    public class AuctionDAO
extends java.lang.Object
implements DAO<Auction,java.lang.Integer>
    This class manages a SQL database connection for saving and retrieving Auction objects.

    • Method Detail

      • save

        public boolean save(Auction obj)
        Inserts a new Auction object into the table. If successful, this method will set the auction_id of the given parameter to the ID assigned to it by the database.
        Specified by:
        save in interface DAO<Auction,java.lang.Integer>
        Parameters:
        obj - the new auction data to be stored
        Returns:
        true if the insertion was successful; false otherwise.

      • retrieveAll

        public java.util.List<Auction> retrieveAll()
        Returns a list of all auctions in the table.
        Specified by:
        retrieveAll in interface DAO<Auction,java.lang.Integer>
        Returns:
        a list of auctions

      • retrieveByID

        public Auction retrieveByID(java.lang.Integer integer)
        Retrieves the auction with the specified auction ID.
        Specified by:
        retrieveByID in interface DAO<Auction,java.lang.Integer>
        Parameters:
        integer - the ID of the auction to search for
        Returns:
        the auction with that ID, or null if no such auction was found.

      • delete

        public boolean delete(Auction obj)
        Removes the auction with the same auction ID as the given parameter from the database.
        Specified by:
        delete in interface DAO<Auction,java.lang.Integer>
        Parameters:
        obj - the object to be deleted.
        Returns:
        true in most cases. false is returned when an issue occurred with accessing the database.

      • update

        public boolean update(Auction obj)
        Updates auction information.
        Specified by:
        update in interface DAO<Auction,java.lang.Integer>
        Parameters:
        obj - the new auction data
        Returns:
        true if at least one row was affected by the update, false otherwise.
